name: Wan Chuan Lin

projects.title: LED cube
projects.description: A LED cube as desktop decoration

articles.title: Some PCB layout tips for ESD Protection
articles.description: Basic knowledge about ESD and TVS and some takeaways from reading 'ESD Protection Layout Guide' application note slva680 Texas Instruments.
articles.courtesy: Guy Yater. (2015, February). ESD protection layout guide (rev. A). https://www.ti.com/lit/pdf/slva680

services.title: PCB layout
services.description: Make your PCB layout more beautiful and functional

services.title: Embedded C programming
services.description: Write firmware for your project including FreeRTOS and LVGL for light weight graphic user interface

aboutpara: I am a bachelor EE student having a strong passion in PCB layout and embedded system development.  I've used EasyEDA and Kicad to draw footprint, schematic, and layout. I am currently implementing LVGL & FreeRTOS and reading topics about signal integrity.

resume.tagline: üëã  I'm a embedded system & PCB layout engineer.
resume.description: I am a third-year bachelor student at the Department of Electrical Engineering in National Taiwan University having a strong passion in PCB layout and embedded system development.  I've used EasyEDA and Kicad to draw footprint, schematic, and layout. I am currently learning and implementing LVGL and FreeRTOS.

experiences.position: Embedded system engineer at Seample Coral
bullets: Work as embedded engineer to design the lighting and temperature control system in the aquarium product line
My job involves architecture design, chip selection, writing firmware, PCB layout and testing.

experiences.position: Teaching assistant of Introduction to electrical engineering design and implementation
bullets: Teaching assistant help student debug their circuit and firmware and give advice on project architecture.
Line following car based on Arduino as midterm project

experiences.position: Lecturer of PCB layout and STM32 at Student Association Academic Department
bullets: Design and teach project based lecture to let junior students become familiar with circuit design and embedded C programming.

education.Para: Lovely campus, great professors, and a lot of freedom to choose courses.

education.schoolName: Mathematics and Science Gifted Class at Affiliated Senior High School of National Taiwan Normal University
education.Para: I was in the Mathematics and Science Gifted Class at Affiliated Senior High School of National Taiwan Normal University.
